channel.title: X-Realms! | Where all the fun begins!
channel.description:
Welcome to X-realms | Where all the fun begins!
[url=http://www.x-realms.com/]Client Download Here![/url] Forums\Webclient\Voting will be up tonight!
NEED STAFF! Active owner(s) - respond to every request Professional game & website developers Daily server & forum updates Stable drop rates & economy Double XP weekends
Main Features:
Completionist cape w/ 12 requirements Ganodermic & Polypore dungeons Clan chat & friends chat Support Tickets Trivia System Lottery System (NEW!) Money Pouch Gravestones Dwarf Multicannons (NEW!) Farming Hunter Summoning Co-op Slayer 100's of slayer tasks Fight Pits Duel Arena (NEW - SCAM FREE!) Warriors Guild Dominion Tower Runespan Clan Wars Castle Wars Revamped PvP and PvM (NEW!) Fight Caves (63 waves) Fight Kiln (36 waves) Barrows King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Kalphite Queen Barrelchest Yk'Lagor the Thunderous (Donor boss!) Avatar of Destruction Avatar of Creation King Daggonoths Pest Queen Nomad Bork Nex Giant Mole (NEW!)
Server specs:
Intel Xeon E3-1270v3 (4 x 3.5 GHz) Advanced 7 Layer DDoS Mitigation 1000 Mbps switchport 16GB RAM 1TB HDD
[size=18pt][B]WINGS![/B][/size] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mwb583.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rnv2ms.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2a7izj4.png[/img] [size=24pt][b]DONATOR ZONE[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/21cau5z.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]HOME ::HOME[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1fehe9.png[/img] [b][size=24pt]SHOPS[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2lj2dtu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2954qbp.png[/img]
We strive to provide the best uptime and gameplay in the runescape private server community, a stable economy, and endless features to keep you busy, X-Realms has something for everyone. So.. what are you waiting for? Come give us a few minutes of your time, you may fall in love with X-Realms

item.title: X-Realms! | Where all the fun begins!
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“THarris, post:3, topic:538239”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=657066.msg4395891#msg4395891 date=1389108395]
My computer will suicide if i play on that revision , It would lag so bad
[/quote]
No lag at all.[/quote]

I said for me not the server :rolleyes:

Read full topic
